revised_title: Advances in Heavy Electrical Plant: Air-Blast Circuit Breakers
tldr: This article discusses the current design trends and advancements in heavy electrical plant, specifically air-blast circuit breakers. It explores the advantages of using air as a switching medium and the research being conducted on gas-blast interrupters. The article also reviews various constructions and designs of air-blast circuit breakers, their use in different voltage ranges, and the requirements for ultra-high voltage circuit breakers.
